translated: Triple H, HHH, Hunter Hearst Helmsley, The Game, or his real name Paul Michael Levesque is an American professional wrestler born July 27, 1969 in New Hampshire.
original: Triple H, HHH, Hunter Hearst Helmsley, The Game, ou de son vrai nom Paul Michael Levesque, est un catcheur américain né le 27 juillet 1969 dans le New Hampshire.
